pr_title: Modify /search2 to return a list of words to highlight

timeline.message:
Update DefaultSearch.QueryParser for Java 8

That is, use the enhanced for loop; and diamond operator for generic constructors.

While at it, remove an unused variable (tokens) and some old NLS comments.

Return words to hightlight from /search2

We need to return which words should be highlighted from a query, so the New UI can emulate the word highlighting in search results of the legacy UI.

timeline.body: This wasn't used - other than to store values (never read from).
timeline.bodyText: This wasn't used - other than to store values (never read from).
timeline.bodyHTML: This wasn't used - other than to store values (never read from).

timeline.body:
is this name specific to a library?
If not spelling it out fully could be nice

```suggestion
    private final List<String> highlight;
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
is this name specific to a library?
If not spelling it out fully could be nice

Suggested change
private final List<String> hilight;
private final List<String> highlight;
timeline.author: ChristianMurphy

replies.bodyText: Heh! 😁 Yeah I also was sooooo tempted to go and change this, but then I'd also need to modify the getHilightedList() and then all the other calls to it. Suddenly it seemed like I'd be getting too carried away for this PR. I wonder if it's a typo or a historical something or rather. 🤔
